Title: El-Rufai’s son, Bello, apologises to Jonathan for past criticism
Summary: Bello El-Rufai, a member of the House of Representatives representing Kaduna North Federal Constituency, has publicly apologised to former President Goodluck Jonathan for his past criticisms of his administration . He acknowledged that his previous views were shaped by youthful inexperience .

Title: Police rescue 11 victims, arrest 2 kidnappers, recover gun in raids
Summary: Police rescued 11 kidnapped victims and arrested two suspected kidnappers . Police recovered a substantial cache of illegal firearms and ammunition . These operations took place in Katsina and Delta .

Title: NNPC rakes in N5.89trn revenue, N748bn PAT for April
Summary: NNPC rakes in N5.89trn revenue, N748bn PAT for April . The Nigerian National Petroleum Company Limited (NNPC) signalled transparency under new leadership .

Title: Abbas eyes Dec 2025 for constitutional amendment, gender inclusion
Summary: Abbas eyes Dec 2025 for constitutional amendment, gender inclusion . Speaker of the House of Representatives, Tajudeen Abbas, has stated that the lawmakers will leave no stone unturned .

Title: Group accuses Fanwo, Abejide of using Ododo’s name to split APC
Summary: Group accuses Fanwo, Abejide of using Ododo’s name to split APC . Stakeholders and loyalists of the All Progressives Congress (APC) in Yagba Federal Constituency, Kogi State .

Title: Liverpool agree club-record £116m deal to sign Wirtz
Summary: Liverpool agree club-record £116m deal to sign Wirtz . Reports in Germany suggested the potential fee could rise to 150m euros (£127m, $172m)

Title: Lone India plane crash survivor recounts miracle escape
Summary: "After that, the plane seemed to speed up, heading straight towards what turned out to be a hostel of a hospital," says Lone India plane crash survivor . "Everything was visible in front of my eyes when the crash happened," he says .

Title: Global airlines cancel flights to Middle East after Israel hits Iran
Summary: Israel pounded Iran in a series of air raids on June 13, striking 100 targets including Tehran's nuclear and military sites, and killing the armed forces' chief of staff, the head of Iran's Revolutionary Guards and top nuclear scientists . Israel said Tehran launched 100 drones in response towards Israel whose defences were working to intercept, the Israeli military said

Title: Oluremi Tinubu promises support for albinos
Summary: Nigeria’s First Lady, Sen. Oluremi Tinubu, has reaffirmed her commitment to advocating for the rights and well-being of persons living with albinism across the country . The 2025 theme is: “Demanding Our Rights: Protect Our Skin, Preserve Our Lives.” The First Lady

Title: JUST IN: Liverpool seal £116m deal for Florian Wirtz
Summary: Liverpool have finalized a £116 million transfer agreement to bring German attacking midfielder Florian Wirtz from Bayer Leverkusen . The fee includes a guaranteed £100m and a further £16m in add-ons . The potential total could eclipse the British record set by Chelsea’s £107m purchase of Enzo Fernandez in

Title: UN, US, Russia, China call for calm after Israeli bombardment of Iran
Summary: US President Donald Trump said he was aware Israel was going to conduct strikes on Iran before they happened . He said: “Iran cannot have a nuclear bomb and we are hoping to get back to the negotiating table. We will see.” US President Barack Obama said the US is ready to defend itself and Israel if Iran retaliates
